As he sees that the program kicks in to block the scalpel, the Iron 
Squad Commander stops right there.

Yggdrasil: Not as I feared, but even worse... Primus... These pred 
programs have gotten better... I'd have to trigger the program to 
remove it and then work as fast as I can... We need something more 
than just technology...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
>

be
